data.title: Records Released In Response to Presidential Records Act (PRA) questions under the Trump Administration
data.meta_description: NARA officials are often consulted about the management of presidential and federal records. The Presidential Records Act governs access to records after the end of an administration. The National Archives received records from the Trump Administration, which ended on January 20, 2021. We are in the process of preserving and providing access to these records, including all
